page.title: 20Annual Holidays
page.content: On a school survey into just where people go for their holidays it was found that 41% of families still can afford to go abroad for their holidays. The most popular spot for continental holidays, both with the children and their parents is still the popular resorts of Spain. Those that do not go abroad still look for an annual holiday by the sea-side. This means that most families prefer to holiday in either Cornwall or Devon because they can expect to get more sunshine than if they holiday elsewhere.
